senses.sense_definition: An overhanging slope or a slope that inclines in the opposite direction to the surrounding terrain.

examples.text: The engineer designed a retaining wall to support the unstable <w>counterslope</w>.
Soldiers took cover behind the <w>counterslope</w> to avoid enemy fire.

senses.sense_definition: To slope or incline in the opposite side or direction.

examples.text: The terrain begins to <w>counterslope</w> sharply as you approach the riverbank.
The architect decided to <w>counterslope</w> the roof to improve drainage.
